name: Recent Developments in Dosage Form Design
description: Introduction to controlled drug delivery: Mechanisms and kinetics of controlled drug release. Fundamental theories and mathematical tools for the design of modern dosage forms. Development and applications of controlled drug delivery dosage forms. This course is restricted to Pharmaceutical Chemistry specialist program students.
department: The Leslie Dan Faculty of Pharmacy
prerequisites: Enrolled as a Year 4 student in the Pharmaceutical Chemistry specialist program.
